skill.name: execute-plan
skill.tagline: Turn your development plans into working code with automated execution and human oversight.
skill.shortSummary: Automatically executes development plans with parallel task processing and built-in verification gates.
skill.fullSummary: This skill automatically implements development plans by loading plan files and executing tasks in parallel while respecting dependencies. It includes built-in human verification gates for critical steps and stops execution when blockers are encountered, ensuring reliable implementation with proper oversight.

highlights.title: Parallel Task Execution
highlights.description: Executes multiple development tasks simultaneously while respecting dependencies between them. This maximizes efficiency by working on independent tasks concurrently, significantly speeding up the implementation process.

highlights.title: Human Verification Gates
highlights.description: Automatically pauses execution at critical points to request human verification before proceeding. This ensures important decisions receive proper oversight while maintaining automation for routine implementation steps.

highlights.title: Smart Block Detection
highlights.description: Immediately stops execution when encountering blockers like missing dependencies, test failures, or unclear instructions. Instead of guessing, it asks for clarification, preventing wasted effort on incorrect implementations.

highlights.title: Plan-First Approach
highlights.description: Requires a finalized plan file before starting implementation, ensuring you have a clear roadmap. It follows plan steps exactly and references other skills when specified, maintaining consistency with your development strategy.

steps.name: Load Plan
steps.description: Read and load the finalized development plan file.
steps.details: The skill begins by reading your complete plan file to understand the implementation roadmap. This ensures all execution follows your predefined strategy and requirements.

steps.name: Execute Tasks
steps.description: Process development tasks in parallel while respecting dependencies.
steps.details: Tasks are executed simultaneously to maximize efficiency, with intelligent dependency management ensuring dependent tasks wait for prerequisites. This balances speed with proper execution order.

steps.name: Request Verification
steps.description: Pause execution for human approval at critical points.
steps.details: When tasks require verification or important decisions, execution stops and requests human confirmation. This maintains oversight while automating routine implementation work.

steps.name: Handle Feedback
steps.description: Apply changes based on verification responses and continue.
steps.details: After receiving verification feedback, the skill applies any necessary changes and continues with remaining tasks. This cycle repeats until all plan items are completed.

steps.name: Stop When Blocked
steps.description: Immediately halt execution when encountering blockers.
steps.details: If issues like missing dependencies, test failures, or unclear instructions arise, execution stops completely. This prevents wasted effort and ensures problems are addressed before proceeding.
